Text: "Your subscription does not include coverage for this airport" (Europe). Guess the version uploaded is for America only...? Useless for me then.

So, I've downloaded the JeppFD App from the store. I don't have a serial so I can't activate. JeppFD tells me that there is an update available but I can't download the update as it first wants me to enter the serial. I've copied the Documents folder to User Apps/JeppFD/Documets (which was empty) but then I run the App in Demo mode I can see for example European airports but when I want to look at a approach plate I get the "There is a problem with the database" error or something like that. Could someone please explain to me how to install the Database correctly?

hello;
please the windows pc cycle 1218, please :-)
dont work with me, no airport is under coverage
If you're updating with an already expired cycle you must rewind the ipad system clock back to the dates when the cycle is active or you will have problems.

Once again, thank you ever so much for the share.
Upload you next for JeppFD 1219 i hope...
Thks a lot.

No problems with this Cycle, still German, American, UAE etc. airports. No data lost for the JeppTC app.

Thanks for upload :)
how can you bypass the activate/demo splash screen?
